content: stay comfortable in this lighthearted crochet cabana shirt that s perfect for warmer weather stitched in red heart roll with it melange this project was inspired by a timeless classic made granny style the vibrant colors throughout this soft yarn emphasize the unique construction of this top which is assembled without any sewing learn granny stitch double_crochet chain slip_stitch seaming and more it s a must-have for any summer wardrobe gauge 16 sts double_crochet and chain and 8 row = 4 10 cm in pat materials red heart® roll with it melange™ 5 3 oz/150 g 389 yds/356 m sizes xs/s/m l/xl 2/3xl 4/5 xl hollywood 3 4 5 6 balls finished chest xs/s/m 44 112 cm l/xl 52 132 cm 2/3xl 60 152 5 cm 4/5xl 68 173 cm
